mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_credit_account (user_id, total_amount, available_amount, account_status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{availableAmount}, 'open', NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_amount = total_amount + VALUES(total_amount), available_amount = available_amount + VALUES(available_amount), update_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, total_amount, available_amount, account_status, create_time, update_time FROM user_credit_account WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND account_status = 'open'
